definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
Jintan county level city in Changzhou 常州[Chang2 zhou1], Jiangsu

sentences.english: And he built an altar there to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 也在那裏審判以色列人，且爲耶和華築了一座壇。

sentences.english: He shall also burn the fat of the sin offering on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 贖罪祭牲的脂油要在壇上焚燒。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 這貢要穿在壇兩旁的環子內，用以擡壇。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 這貢要穿在壇兩旁的環子內，用以擡壇。

sentences.english: Then the altar will be most holy, and whatever touches it will be holy.
The priest shall take the basket from your hands and set it down in front of the altar of the LORD your God.
sentences.chinese: 祭司就從你手裏取過筐子來，放在耶和華你神的壇前。

sentences.english: He thought of his paper as a pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 他當初把這份報紙當做一個講道壇。

sentences.english: Then at the place where I saw the angel of the Lord, I built a altar.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，在那個主的使者出現的地方，我立了一座壇。

sentences.english: Slaughter it and take the blood and sprinkle it against the altar on all sides.
sentences.chinese: 要宰這羊，把血灑在壇的周圍。

sentences.english: There he built an altar to the Lord and called on the name of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 他在那裏又爲耶和華築了一座壇，求告耶和華的名。

sentences.english: So he built an altar there to the Lord , who had appeared to him.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯蘭就在那裏爲向他顯現的耶和華築了一座壇。

sentences.english: The left pillar closest to the chancel is installed with a gold-plated marble pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 左列最靠近祭臺的一根柱子上設有大理石鎦金講道壇。

sentences.english: Neither shalt thou go up by steps unto mine altar, that thy nakedness be not discovered thereon.
sentences.chinese: 你上我的壇，不可用臺階，免得露出你的下體來。

sentences.english: He must die, because he has broken down Baal's altar and cut down the Asherah pole beside it.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他拆毀了巴力的壇，砍下壇旁的木偶。

sentences.english: Whilst their children remember their altars and their groves by the green trees upon the high hills.
sentences.chinese: 他們的兒女記念他們高岡上，青翠樹旁的壇和木偶。

sentences.english: As an important writer, Xinqiji was called the Dragon of Poet in Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 辛棄疾，人稱詞中之龍，是兩宋詞壇的重要作家。

definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
